title: SQL Format Style Configuration
description: Configuration schema for T-SQL code formatting, reverse-engineered from RedGate SQL Prompt style files and the SQL Prompt Formatting Wallchart.

whitespace.description: Global whitespace, wrapping, semicolons, and blank-line rules.

tabBehavior.description: Whether to use spaces, tabs, or tabs where possible.

numberOfSpacesInTab.description: How many spaces equal one tab stop.

wrapLongLines.description: Whether to wrap lines that exceed the max line length.

whitespaceBeforeSemicolon.description: Whitespace to place before a semicolon.

insertSemicolons.description: Insert a semicolon statement terminator after each complete statement. Also available as CLI flag: --insert-semicolons. In T-SQL, semicolons are optional in most places but are best practice and required before WITH (CTEs) and after MERGE/THROW.

newLines.description: Blank-line controls between and within statements.

preserveExistingEmptyLinesBetweenStateme.description: Keep existing blank lines between statements as-is.

emptyLinesBetweenStatements.description: Number of blank lines to insert between statements.

emptyLinesAfterBatchSeparator.description: Number of blank lines to insert after GO.

preserveExistingEmptyLinesAfterBatchSepa.description: Keep existing blank lines after GO as-is.

preserveExistingEmptyLinesWithinStatemen.description: Keep existing blank lines inside statements as-is.

preserveExistingEmptyLinesBetweenComment.description: Keep existing blank lines between consecutive comment lines.

lists.description: Formatting for comma-separated lists (SELECT columns, GROUP BY items, parameter lists, etc.).

placeFirstItemOnNewLine.description: Whether to place the first list item on a new line after the keyword.

placeSubsequentItemsOnNewLines.description: Whether to place each subsequent list item on its own line.

alignSubsequentItemsWithFirstItem.description: Align subsequent list items to the column position of the first item.

alignItemsAcrossClauses.description: Align list items across different clauses (e.g., SELECT and GROUP BY columns line up).

indentListItems.description: Indent list items relative to the clause keyword.

alignItemsToTabStops.description: Snap list item indentation to tab-stop boundaries.

alignAliases.description: Align column/table aliases to the same column position.

alignComments.description: Align inline comments to the same column position.

commas.description: Comma placement and spacing within lists.

placeCommasBeforeItems.description: Place commas at the start of each line (leading commas) instead of trailing.

commaAlignment.description: When using leading commas, how to align them.

addSpaceBeforeComma.description: Insert a space before each comma.

addSpaceAfterComma.description: Insert a space after each comma (when items are on the same line).

parenthesisStyle.description: How parentheses and their contents are laid out. 'expandedToStatement': opening paren on same line, contents indented, closing paren aligned to statement. 'compactToStatement': like expanded but closing paren on same line as last content. 'expandedToParenthesis': closing paren aligned to opening paren. 'compactToParenthesis': like expanded-to-paren but compact.

collapseShortParenthesisContents.description: Collapse parenthesized content to a single line if short enough.

collapseParenthesesShorterThan.description: Character-length threshold for collapsing parenthesized content.

addSpacesAroundParentheses.description: Add a space before '(' and after ')'.

addSpacesAroundParenthesesContents.description: Add a space after '(' and before ')'.

casing.description: Case transformation for keywords, functions, types, and identifiers.

reservedKeywords.description: Case for SQL reserved keywords (SELECT, FROM, WHERE, JOIN, etc.).

builtInFunctions.description: Case for built-in SQL functions (COUNT, SUM, ISNULL, COALESCE, etc.).

builtInDataTypes.description: Case for built-in data types (INT, VARCHAR, DATETIME, etc.).

useObjectDefinitionCase.description: Preserve the original case of user-defined objects (tables, columns, procs) as they were defined.

identifiers.description: Identifier quoting / bracket-enclosure rules. Also available as CLI flag: --enclose-identifiers withBrackets|withoutBrackets.

encloseIdentifiers.description: Whether to wrap user-defined identifiers (columns, tables, schemas, aliases) in square brackets. 'withBrackets': always enclose â€” column1 becomes [column1], dbo.tableName becomes [dbo].[tableName]. 'withoutBrackets': strip existing brackets and leave identifiers bare. 'asis': preserve whatever quoting already exists.

encloseIdentifiersScope.description: Which identifiers to enclose. 'all': columns, tables, schemas, aliases, parameters. 'userDefined': only user-defined objects (not keywords, not built-in functions). 'tablesAndColumns': only table names, column names, and schema names.

alwaysBracketReservedWordIdentifiers.description: Always bracket identifiers that happen to be reserved words (e.g., a column named [status] or [name]), regardless of the encloseIdentifiers setting.

dml.description: Formatting for DML statements (SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE).

clauseAlignment.description: How clause keywords (SELECT, FROM, WHERE, etc.) are aligned.

clauseIndentation.description: Number of spaces to indent clause contents from the keyword.

placeDistinctAndTopClausesOnNewLine.description: Place DISTINCT or TOP on its own line after SELECT.

addNewLineAfterDistinctAndTopClauses.description: Add a line break after DISTINCT/TOP before the column list.

collapseShortStatements.description: Collapse entire DML statements to one line if short enough.

collapseStatementsShorterThan.description: Character-length threshold for collapsing DML statements.

collapseShortSubqueries.description: Collapse subqueries to one line if short enough.

listItems.description: Controls when FROM/WHERE/GROUP BY/ORDER BY list items go on new lines.

placeFromTableOnNewLine.description: Place each FROM table on a new line.

placeWhereConditionOnNewLine.description: Place each WHERE condition on a new line.

placeGroupByAndOrderByOnNewLine.description: Place each GROUP BY / ORDER BY expression on a new line.

placeInsertTableOnNewLine.description: Place the INSERT target table name on a new line.

ddl.description: Formatting for DDL statements (CREATE/ALTER TABLE, CREATE/ALTER PROCEDURE, etc.).

parenthesisStyle.description: How parentheses in DDL (column list, parameter list) are laid out.

indentParenthesesContents.description: Indent contents of DDL parentheses (column defs, params).

alignDataTypesAndConstraints.description: Align data type and constraint columns in CREATE TABLE.

placeConstraintsOnNewLines.description: Place constraint definitions (PRIMARY KEY, FOREIGN KEY, etc.) on new lines.

placeConstraintColumnsOnNewLines.description: Place columns within constraints on new lines.

indentClauses.description: Indent nested clauses (WITH, ON, etc.) inside DDL.

placeFirstProcedureParameterOnNewLine.description: Place the first procedure/function parameter on a new line.

collapseShortStatements.description: Collapse short DDL statements to one line.

collapseStatementsShorterThan.description: Character-length threshold for collapsing DDL statements.

controlFlow.description: Formatting for BEGIN/END, IF/ELSE, WHILE, TRY/CATCH blocks.

placeBeginKeywordOnNewLine.description: Place BEGIN on its own line (vs. on same line as IF/WHILE/etc.).

indentBeginEndKeywords.description: Indent BEGIN/END keywords relative to the parent control-flow keyword.

indentContentsOfStatements.description: Indent the body inside control-flow blocks.

collapseShortStatements.description: Collapse short control-flow blocks to one line.

collapseStatementsShorterThan.description: Character-length threshold for collapsing control-flow blocks.

cte.description: Formatting for Common Table Expressions (WITH ... AS ...).

placeNameOnNewLine.description: Place the CTE name on a new line after WITH.

indentName.description: Indent the CTE name relative to WITH.

placeColumnsOnNewLine.description: Place the optional CTE column list on a new line.

placeAsOnNewLine.description: Place the AS keyword on a new line.

asAlignment.description: Alignment of the AS keyword relative to WITH.

parenthesisStyle.description: How the CTE body parentheses are formatted.

indentContents.description: Indent the query body inside the CTE parentheses.

variables.description: Formatting for DECLARE and SET variable statements.

alignDataTypesAndValues.description: Align data types and default values in DECLARE blocks.

addSpaceBetweenDataTypeAndPrecision.description: Add a space between data type and precision, e.g., VARCHAR (50) vs VARCHAR(50).

placeAssignedValueOnNewLineIfLongerThanM.description: Move the assigned value to a new line if the SET statement exceeds the max line length.

placeEqualsSignOnNewLine.description: Place the = sign on a new line in SET assignments.

joinStatements.description: Formatting for JOIN clauses and ON conditions.

placeOnNewLine.description: Place the JOIN keyword on a new line.

keywordAlignment.description: How the JOIN keyword is aligned. 'toFrom': align to FROM. 'rightAlignedToFrom': right-align JOIN to match FROM column. 'indented': indent from FROM. 'toTable': align to the table name.

insertEmptyLineBetweenJoinClauses.description: Insert a blank line between consecutive JOIN clauses.

placeJoinTableOnNewLine.description: Place the joined table name on a new line after the JOIN keyword.

placeOnNewLine.description: Place the ON keyword on a new line.

keywordAlignment.description: How the ON keyword is aligned. 'indented': indent from JOIN. 'toJoin': align to JOIN keyword. 'rightAlignedToJoin': right-align to JOIN.

placeConditionOnNewLine.description: Place the ON condition expression on a new line after ON.

conditionAlignment.description: How the ON condition is aligned. 'indented': indent from ON. 'toOn': align to ON. 'toTable': align to the table name.

columnList.description: Formatting for the INSERT column list.

placeSubsequentColumnsOnNewLines.description: Whether to place each column on its own line.

placeSubsequentValuesOnNewLines.description: Whether to place each value tuple on its own line.

restoreStatements.description: Formatting for RESTORE/BACKUP statements (SQL Server specific).

placeToOnNewLine.description: Place the TO keyword on a new line.

caseExpressions.description: Formatting for CASE / WHEN / THEN / ELSE / END expressions.

placeExpressionOnNewLine.description: Place the input expression (simple CASE) on a new line after CASE.

placeFirstWhenOnNewLine.description: Place the first WHEN on a new line.

placeThenOnNewLine.description: Place THEN on a new line after the WHEN condition.

placeElseOnNewLine.description: Place ELSE on a new line.

alignElseToWhen.description: Align ELSE to the same column as WHEN.

placeEndOnNewLine.description: Place END on a new line.

collapseShortCaseExpressions.description: Collapse CASE expressions to one line if short enough.

collapseCaseExpressionsShorterThan.description: Character-length threshold for collapsing CASE expressions.

functionCalls.description: Formatting for function call arguments and parentheses.

placeArgumentsOnNewLines.description: Whether to place function arguments on new lines.

addSpacesAroundParentheses.description: Add a space before '(' and after ')' in function calls.

addSpacesAroundArgumentList.description: Add a space after '(' and before ')' in function calls.

addSpaceBetweenEmptyParentheses.description: Add a space inside empty parentheses: GETDATE( ) vs GETDATE().

operators.description: Formatting for comparison, logical, arithmetic, BETWEEN, and IN operators.

align.description: Vertically align comparison operators across consecutive conditions.

addSpacesAroundComparisonOperators.description: Add spaces around comparison operators: a = b vs a=b.

addSpacesAroundArithmeticOperators.description: Add spaces around arithmetic operators (+, -, *, /): a + b vs a+b.

placeOnNewLine.description: Whether to place AND/OR on a new line.

alignment.description: How AND/OR keywords are aligned. 'toStatement': align to the clause keyword. 'rightAligned': right-align to the clause keyword. 'toFirstListItem': align to the first condition. 'indented': indent from the clause.

placeBeforeCondition.description: Place AND/OR before the condition (vs. after the previous condition).

placeOnNewLine.description: Place the BETWEEN keyword on a new line.

placeAndKeywordOnNewLine.description: Place the AND (in BETWEEN x AND y) on a new line.

andAlignment.description: How the BETWEEN-AND keyword is aligned.

placeOpeningParenthesisOnNewLine.description: Place the opening '(' of IN on a new line.

openingParenthesisAlignment.description: Alignment of the opening parenthesis when on a new line.

placeFirstValueOnNewLine.description: Place the first value inside IN on a new line.

placeSubsequentValuesOnNewLines.description: Place each subsequent value in IN on its own line.

addSpaceAroundInContents.description: Add a space after '(' and before ')' in IN lists.
